extendedIngredients.name: olive oil
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tablespoon olive oil, optional pure butter melted

extendedIngredients.name: turkey breast
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 slices cooked turkey breast (leftover turkey is perfect)

extendedIngredients.name: whole cranberry sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/4 cup cranberry sauce, more to taste

recipes.title: Turkey, Pesto & Cranberry Melt
recipes.instructions: Prepare sandwiches by spreading olive oil on one side of bread. Heat a large griddle or nonstick skillet to medium heat, add bread and place olive oil side down. Add turkey slices and cranberry sauce to 4 slices and pesto and cheese to the other 4. Grill until bread is golden on the bottom, turkey is hot and cheese melted. Place the cheese slices on top of the turkey. Remove sandwiches and cut in half. Enjoy!

steps.step: Prepare sandwiches by spreading olive oil on one side of bread.
Heat a large griddle or nonstick skillet to medium heat, add bread and place olive oil side down.
Add turkey slices and cranberry sauce to 4 slices and pesto and cheese to the other 4. Grill until bread is golden on the bottom, turkey is hot and cheese melted.
Place the cheese slices on top of the turkey.
Remove sandwiches and cut in half. Enjoy!
